details.description: Armed forces pension calculator - get a forecast of your armed forces pension
details.more_information:
The calculator covers both of the armed forces pension schemes - AFPS 1975 and AFPS 2005.

It doesn’t include transfers in from another pension scheme, or the value of any added years contracts.

Who can’t use the calculator

If you’re a member of the Military Provost Guard Service (MPGS), you need to contact the Service Personnel and Veterans Agency to get a forecast of your pension.
